name: Drive (itch)
description:
Drive

In this simulator game you, the player, are put in the front seat of the car with the purpose to Drive. The game is a homage to the all time favourite game “Desert Bus”.

Graphics

All graphics are hand-made and carefully created in a retro game style.

Controls

Fully interactive car: use your horn, turn signals and radio whenever you want.

  • W - Accelerate
  • S - Break
  • A - Turn left
  • D - Turn right
  • One - Horn
  • Two - Toggle radio
  • Three - Toggle left turn signal
  • Four - Toggle right turn signal
  • Five - Toggle wipers
  • Six - Toggle AC
World

The world is populated with different surprises. Drive to find out these mysteries.

Store

Use in-game currency to buy the car of your choice (if you can afford it).

Highscore (Global)

Drive to be the best driver in the world. There can be only one!

Collaborative achievements

The game is full of achievements, both hidden and open ones. Drive to achieve the collaborative achievements!
